attributes.action: Add India to UK travel ban “red list” to stop spreading new India Covid variant.
attributes.additional_details: The government must take notice and do the right thing and save lives by immediately adding India to the UK travel ban “red list” to help stop spreading new India Covid variant.
attributes.background: Add India to UK travel ban ‘red list’ to stop spreading new India Covid variant. India recorded a daily increase of 217,353 infections on Friday, the country’s second record in consecutive days, pushing its total past 14.2 million cases. Making India one of the world leaders in new covid cases.
